templates.subject: Ohio's Summer Crisis Program is accepting applications now!
templates.text_preview: {{FirstName|default("Hello")}}, As temperatures rise across Ohio, we want to ensure that no family has to choose between staying cool and paying other essential bills. The Ohio Summer Crisis Program is now accepting applications, and we encourage eligible households to enroll as soon as possible. What is the Summer Crisis Program? The Summer Crisis Program provides financial assistance to help eligible Ohio households pay their electric bills during the hot summer months. This vital program helps families maintain air conditioning and other essential cooling services when they need them most. Program Benefits: Financial assistance with electric bills to maintain cooling Help preventing service disconnections Support for reconnection of previously disconnected service Peace of mind during Ohio's hottest months Don't Wait - Apply Today Summer temperatures can be dangerous, especially for vulnerable populations including young children, elderly residents, and those with health conditions.

templates.subject: Summertime surge in energy prices will hit your pocketbook hard!
templates.text_preview: Summertime is meant for later days, warm nights and an occasional splash at the local pool. But this year, it also means a surge to your energy bills. According to news outlets, every Ohio electric utility in Ohio is expected to raise rates this summer, some as much as 36%. We project you are already paying about {{monthlycost}} per month in energy bills. Imagine adding 20-30-35% to that! With all the stresses of managing a family budget, this summertime surge is sure to hit your pocketbook hard. Ohio's Energy Assistance Programs Can Help We're here to help keep money in your pocket for the things that matter. Through Ohio's energy assistance programs, we think we can save you about {{monthlysavings}} per month. That's real financial relief, allowing you to better care for yourself and your family.
